mapper.select: SELECT o.*,u.`userName`,s.`storeName`,s.`storeImg`,s.`storeAddress`,s.`coordinate`,s.`storePhone`,dm.`dmName` FROM `order` o INNER JOIN `user` u ON o.`userId`=u.`id` INNER JOIN store s ON o.`storeId`=s.`id` LEFT JOIN deliveryMan dm ON dm.`id`=o.`deliveryManId` WHERE o.`userId`=#{userId} and o.`orderState` IN (1,2,3,4) ORDER BY o.`orderTime` DESC
SELECT o.*,s.`storeName`,s.`storeAddress`,s.`coordinate` FROM `order` o INNER JOIN store s ON o.`storeId`=s.`id` WHERE s.`area`=#{district} AND o.`orderState`=2

SELECT o.*,u.`userName`,s.`storeName`,s.`storeImg`,s.`storeAddress`,s.`coordinate`,s.`storePhone`,dm.`dmName` FROM `order` o INNER JOIN `user` u ON o.`userId`=u.`id` INNER JOIN store s ON o.`storeId`=s.`id` LEFT JOIN deliveryMan dm ON dm.`id`=o.`deliveryManId` where o.id=#{id}
